thread.title: ASHLY
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by ASHLY

author: ASHLY
title: ASHLY
text: I bought my previous living room furniture from here in 2015. The prices are great, and the deliver was on time! This time around, Stephanie assisted me, and she was great! Very helpful in making suggestions and showing me all options specific to what I was looking for! Keep up the great business!
